text.div:
EncounterLocationStatus

The status of the location.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/encounter-location-status defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
planned Planned The patient is planned to be moved to this location at some point in the future.
active Active The patient is currently at this location, or was between the period specified. A system may update these records when the patient leaves the location to either reserved, or completed
reserved Reserved This location is held empty for this patient.
completed Completed The patient was at this location during the period specified. Not to be used when the patient is currently at the location

concept.definition: The patient is planned to be moved to this location at some point in the future.
The patient is currently at this location, or was between the period specified.  A system may update these records when the patient leaves the location to either reserved, or completed
This location is held empty for this patient.
The patient was at this location during the period specified.  Not to be used when the patient is currently at the location
